data.title: Meta's VR technology is helping to train surgeons and treat patients, though costs remain a hurdle
data.description: Virtual reality technology from Meta and other companies is finding its way into hospitals and medical schools even as it struggles to find consumer traction.

data.title: Biden, Modi discuss democracy, technology in meeting ahead of G20 summit
data.description: President Joe Biden kicked off his visit to India with a private meeting with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi at his residence.

data.title: Police rush to reports of 'ritual mass murder,' but it was just a yoga class
data.description: When a yoga teacher turned out the lights toward the end of one of her classes in Britain this week, her hope was to encourage peaceful relaxation.

data.title: From BMW to Porsche: Take a look at the cars on display at one of the world's biggest auto shows
data.description: The BMW Vision Neue Klasse, Mercedes-Benz Concept CLA Class, Lucid Air Midnight Dream Edition and even a Lamborghini made of Lego pieces were on display at IAA Mobility.

data.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

data.title: Apple and Arm sign deal for chip technology that goes beyond 2040
data.description: Apple has secured access to a core piece of intellectual property, the Arm architecture, used in its iPhone and Mac chips, for the foreseeable future.

data.title: Roku stock jumps after company says it will lay off 10% of workforce
data.description: Roku Inc. said in a regulatory filing Wednesday, it will be laying off 10% of its workforce, or 360 people, as it raised its guidance for its third-quarter.

data.title: Tesla rival Polestar plans own smartphone launch alongside its first electric SUV in China
data.description: The move underscores the way in which electric vehicle makers launching in China like Polestar are putting technology at the heart of their offering.
